name: Pirates Crew
description:
The Pirates Crew is a 3D adventure Quest-Game playing on a paradise-like pirate island.

Play the old captain (name) and find a crew for his new ship. But the pirates on the island won´t just join your crew without a price! Help them out and they might join you on your adventures.

Controlls:

Move: W,A,S,D or Left Stick

Camera: Mouse or Right Stick

Interact: E or Square (PS), X (XBOX

Credits:

EpidemicSound

WeLoveIndies
